assignment.address

Class MainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • assignment.address.MainApp

  • public class MainApp
extends javafx.application.Application
    Main controller for the Application. Contains the methods needed to pass information between the controllers and create the user experience,

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        'The main entry point for all JavaFX applications. The start method is called after the init method has returned, and after the system is ready for the application to begin running.' - Oracle Documentation (https://docs.oracle.com/javafx/2/api/javafx/application/Application.html#start(javafx.stage.Stage))'
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - Initial stage passed in from OS.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Some Exception
        See Also:
        Exception

      • showWelcomeScreen

        public void showWelcomeScreen()
        Displays the Welcome Screen. Creates and initialises a FXMLLoader to get the layout from the XML file, then creates a AnchorPane equal to it. Once that is done, a new Scene is created and added to the primary Stage. An instance of the controller class (WelcomeScreenController) is declared and initialised to control the user's interaction with the Welcome Screen. *

      • showMainScreen

        public void showMainScreen()
        Displays the Main Screen. Creates and initialises a FXMLLoader to get the layout from the XML file, then creates a BorderPane equal to it. Once that is done, a new Scene is created and added to the primary Stage. An instance of the controller class (MainScreenController) is declared and initialised to control the user's interaction with the Main Screen. The list of countries is populated and chart data is set by calling the related functions from the controller.

      • showSearchScreen

        public void showSearchScreen()
        Displays the Search Screen. Creates and initialises a FXMLLoader to get the layout from the XML file, then creates a AnchorPane equal to it. Once that is done, a new Scene is created and added to the primary Stage. An instance of the controller class (SearchScreenController) is declared and initialised to control the user's interaction with the Search Screen. The list of countries is passed in as a parameter of setNamesList() to set the contents of the combo box in the Search Screen.

      • showCountryInfoScreen

        public void showCountryInfoScreen(Country searchCountry)
        Displays the Country Information Screen. Creates and initialises a FXMLLoader to get the layout from the XML file, then creates a AnchorPane equal to it. Once that is done, a new Scene is created and added to the primary Stage. An instance of the controller class (CountryInfoController) is declared and initialised to control the user's interaction with the Country Information Screen. The Country is passed in from the SearchScreenController as a result from the search.
        Parameters:
        searchCountry - The country associated with the search parameter entered by the user

      • showCountryEditDialog

        public void showCountryEditDialog(Country country)
        Displays the Country Edit Screen. Creates and initialises a FXMLLoader to get the layout from the XML file, then creates a AnchorPane equal to it. Once that is done, a new Scene is created and added to the primary Stage. An instance of the controller class (CountryEditController) is declared and initialised to control the user's interaction with the Country Edit Screen. The Country is passed in from the CountryInfoController when the user clicks the Edit button.
        Parameters:
        country - The country associated with the information screen

      • showSearchByTradePartner

        public void showSearchByTradePartner(Country searchCountry)
        Displays the Trade Partners Screen. Creates and initialises a FXMLLoader to get the layout from the XML file, then creates a AnchorPane equal to it. Once that is done, a new Scene is created and added to the primary Stage. An instance of the controller class (TradePartnersController) is declared and initialised to control the user's interaction with the Trade Partners Screen. The Country is passed in from the SearchScreenController when the user clicks the Edit button.
        Parameters:
        searchCountry - The country associated with the user's choice from the combo box on the search screen
